channel.title: Music Industry News on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Music Industry News on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Kathleen Hanna Tapped to Host New Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Podcast (Exclusive)
item.description: The show, which will be co-produced by Radiotopia and Talkhouse alongside the Rock Hall, is expected to launch sometime before the Hall’s induction ceremony this November.

item.title: Kathleen Hanna Tapped to Host New Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Podcast (Exclusive)
item.description: The show, which will be co-produced by Radiotopia and Talkhouse alongside the Rock Hall, is expected to launch sometime before the Hall’s induction ceremony this November.

item.title: Barbara Hein, Longtime Capitol Records Operations Manager, Dies at 77
item.description: After playing music with an unknown Harry Nilsson, she got to collaborate with the likes of Barbra Streisand, Tina Turner, Dwight Yoakam and Andrew Lloyd Webber.

item.title: Barbara Hein, Longtime Capitol Records Operations Manager, Dies at 77
item.description: After playing music with an unknown Harry Nilsson, she got to collaborate with the likes of Barbra Streisand, Tina Turner, Dwight Yoakam and Andrew Lloyd Webber.

item.title: Charlie Puth Signs With UTA
item.description: A four-time Grammy Award nominee, Puth has garnered over 35 billion global streams with nine multi-platinum singles.

item.title: Charlie Puth Signs With UTA
item.description: A four-time Grammy Award nominee, Puth has garnered over 35 billion global streams with nine multi-platinum singles.

item.title: Jack White Selling Catalog Stake to Sony Music (Exclusive)
item.description: A source familiar with the matter tells THR that the deal encompasses an unspecified stake in recordings from The White Stripes, White’s solo career and with his bands the Raconteurs and The Dead Weat

item.title: Jack White Selling Catalog Stake to Sony Music (Exclusive)
item.description: A source familiar with the matter tells THR that the deal encompasses an unspecified stake in recordings from The White Stripes, White’s solo career and with his bands the Raconteurs and The Dead Weat

item.title: Music Booking Agencies Ink Merger Deal In Bid to Rival Major Talent Firms
item.description: Arrival Artists and ATC Live are combining to form the newly-titled Roam, which will rep The Lumineers, Big Thief, Fontaines D.C. and many more acts as they tour.

item.title: Music Booking Agencies Ink Merger Deal In Bid to Rival Major Talent Firms
item.description: Arrival Artists and ATC Live are combining to form the newly-titled Roam, which will rep The Lumineers, Big Thief, Fontaines D.C. and many more acts as they tour.

item.title: Kneecap Cancel U.S. Tour Citing British Government “Witch Hunt”
item.description: The Irish rap group cited a scheduling conflict due to a court date in the U.K., though as THR previously reported, the band’s U.S. visa situation became uncertain after they parted ways with IAG in A

item.title: Lauren Christy Wrote Hits for Avril Lavigne and Dua Lipa. Now She Warns of a “National Funeral for Songwriters If Things Don’t Change”
item.description: ‘Their Hits, My Way’ features Christy’s interpretations of classic songs she co-wrote throughout her career.
